messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Location
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Tuck, I actually attended the conference and yes, they do have a group, I just mean there is not an unschoolers only group.  They are mixtures of
messages.messageBody:
Hi Tuck, I actually attended the conference and yes, they do have a group, I just mean there is not an "unschoolers" only group. They are mixtures of homeschoolers and unschoolers.

Jen

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Really? The folks who put on the Rethinking Education conference didn't have
a group?

Tuck


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Location
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/12/2002 9:01:13 AM Central Standard Time, ... Really?  The folks who put on the Rethinking Education conference didn t have a group? Tuck
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/12/2002 9:01:13 AM Central Standard Time,
heartlightdfw@... writes:

> but they seem to keep pretty quiet since their aren't any specific
> unschooling groups here.

Really? The folks who put on the Rethinking Education conference didn't have
a group?

Tuck


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Location
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Jennifer, We are located in Mesquite, east of Dallas. Thanks for the link, I will check it out. Kathy Sullivan: Mom to Logan 15, Andrew 10, Alexander 6 1/2,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jennifer,
We are located in Mesquite, east of Dallas. Thanks for the link, I will check it out.

Kathy Sullivan:
Mom to Logan 15, Andrew 10, Alexander 6 1/2, and Christopher David 14 months.

"Some people think that we put our lives on hold to raise a child, but we know that to hold a child IS life"

"To be free to learn, children must be free to dream!"

----- Original Message -----
From: Jennifer Green
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, December 12, 2002 8:56 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Location


Hi Kathy, My name is Jennifer and I currently live in Arlington. I am in the process of opening the Hearlight DFW Learning Community in the DFW area. There are quite a few unschoolers in the area, but they seem to keep pretty quiet since their aren't any specific unschooling groups here. I do have a local discussion group if you would like to check it out. Just visit the website at www.heartlightdfw.com and click on the link at the bottom of the page to reach the yahoo group.

Btw, I am married to Kevin and we have a 3 year old daughter named Hunter. Where exactly are you in DFW?

Speak to you soon.

Jen

----- Original Message -----
From: Kathy Sullivan
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, December 11, 2002 9:53 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Location


Forgot to ask if there happens to be any DFW, Texas unschoolers on this loop. Would love to find someone near us. :)

Kathy Sullivan:
Mom to Logan 15, Andrew 10, Alexander 6 1/2, and Christopher David 14 months.
http://www.babiesonline.com/babies/c/christopherdavid/

"Some people think that we put our lives on hold to raise a child, but we know that to hold a child IS life"

"To be free to learn, children must be free to dream!"

messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kathy, My name is Jennifer and I currently live in Arlington.  I am in the process of opening the Hearlight DFW Learning Community in the DFW area.  There
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kathy, My name is Jennifer and I currently live in Arlington. I am in the process of opening the Hearlight DFW Learning Community in the DFW area. There are quite a few unschoolers in the area, but they seem to keep pretty quiet since their aren't any specific unschooling groups here. I do have a local discussion group if you would like to check it out. Just visit the website at www.heartlightdfw.com and click on the link at the bottom of the page to reach the yahoo group.

Btw, I am married to Kevin and we have a 3 year old daughter named Hunter. Where exactly are you in DFW?

Speak to you soon.

Jen
